message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on image classification using deep learning models based on CNNs and RNNs. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel approach for hierarchical classification, which involves capturing a hierarchical tree of classes using an RNN or sequence-to-sequence model. This suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper applies residual learning to the RNN part to improve generalization, which could place it under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on a real-world dataset, which could also make it relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
